channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1416; 07:18PM; 12970 W Branford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3dE6qo4; Pacoima; KNOCKDOWN: The first arriving units made an offensive fire attack and located a contents fire within one unit, extinguishing it in 23 minutes with no injuries reported.. They prevented the fire from extending into the adjacent units (smoke only). Additional resources are canceled. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 BC15 BC5 CM40 CM42 E227 E260 E27 E275 E289 E290 E7 E81 E87 E89 E95 E98 EM14 HR3 RA102 RA839 RA98 SQ87 SQ95 T27 T60 T75 T89 T90 UR27 UR88; CH9; 12 14 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1416; 06:55PM; 12970 W Branford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3dE6qo4; Pacoima; Large commercial building with moderate smoke showing from one unit. Additional resources enroute. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 BC15 BC5 CM40 CM42 E227 E260 E27 E275 E289 E290 E7 E81 E87 E89 E95 E98 EM14 HR3 RA102 RA839 RA98 SQ87 SQ95 T27 T60 T75 T89 T90 UR27 UR88; CH9; 12 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Trapped Vehicle; INC#0562; 10:34AM; 348 N Kenter Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sYiHMh; Brentwood; Firefighters extricated the trapped driver (adult female does not appear to have life-threating injuries). It was a single car which rolled down from their driveway up the hill. The car is stable in the backyard and there is no damage to the structure. Removing the vehicle will be an extensive operation and firefighters are evaluating the situation for options. ; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E19 E237 E37 E59 EM9 HR3 RA19 RA71 T37 UR88; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle; INC#0562; 10:20AM; 348 N Kenter Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sYiHMh; Brentwood; One vehicle into a backyard (initial reports of rolling down into backyard) with one person trapped. ; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E19 E237 E37 E59 EM9 HR3 RA19 RA71 T37 UR88; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0294; 07:29AM; 607 W Century Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uLvdzc; Vermont Vista; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters extinguished the fire in 14 minutes with no injuries reported. The building type is updated to a two-story four plex and crews contained the fire to the one unit of origin. A primary and secondary search are clear with no occupants found. No further details.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E57 E64 E65 RA264 RA64 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0294; 07:15AM; 607 W Century Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uLvdzc; Vermont Vista; Two story, garden style apartment building with moderate smoke showing from the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E57 E64 E65 RA264 RA64 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0068; 02:02AM; 819 E Crestmoore Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/4acq2sm; #Venice; It took 28 firefighters 19 minutes to extinguish flames contained mostly in the attack and walls of a two-story home. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 BC9 CM20 CM22 E205 E263 E292 E59 E62 E63 E67 EM11 RA63 RA862 T5 T63 T92; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0068; 01:43AM; 819 E Crestmoore Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/4acq2sm; #Venice; Two-story single-family home with smoke showing from the roof. Offensive mode.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 BC9 CM20 CM22 E205 E263 E292 E59 E62 E63 E67 EM11 RA63 RA862 T5 T63 T92; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0011; 12:52AM; 12909 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/46NbFYc; #Sylmar; Firefighters found heavy fire inside of an auto body shop. Crews began in offensive mode, and eventually withdrew into defensive mode, due to the heavy fire load. It took 68 firefighters 35 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E18 E275 E287 E289 E290 E298 E7 E75 E87 E89 E91 E98 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA889 RA89 RA891 SQ87 T75 T87 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0011; 12:17AM; 12898 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3T9vsy7; #Sylmar; One-story auto body shop with heavy fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E18 E275 E287 E289 E290 E298 E7 E75 E87 E89 E91 E98 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA889 RA89 RA891 SQ87 T75 T87 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Nicholas Prange
